name: TANKER: The Old Man and His Ship
name_original: TANKER: The Old Man and His Ship
description:
(48h Game Jam) You play as the old man - alone on a colossal ocean tanker tasked with cleaning an unknown 'membrane' from the ocean of this world.

You are accompanied only by automated drones, and your ships computer system. You have to balance between driving the ship, deploying drones, and walking around inside the ship to buy upgrades, or fix emergencies.

There are other floors on the ship - it's best to ignore them. Just keep doing your job, no need to explore the ship.
